o Counter strike é um jogo muito bom, o que estraga são alguns jogadores que abusam nas partidas, a Valve tinha que tomar providencias quando a isso é um absurdo o que está acontecendo. jogadores querendo jogar e entra no time sempre uma pessoa querendo acabar com o jogo de todos, dando tiro no time, xingando o time inteiro, hoje mesmo presenciei uma atitude ridícula de 4 jogadores aparentemente amigos falando no discord, começaram a fazer bullyng sem parar e não precisei falar absolutamente nada com nenhum deles, apenas começaram por achar "graça" gostaria que tomassem providencias quando a isso. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aD-3IupLzwQ&feature=youtu.be

Steep learning curve, probably the least beginner friendly game on the planet. 

Game is fun though, when you do good it feels really good because you know it's a direct expression of your skill. But when this game isn't fun it's REALLY NOT FUN.

really good game. dont suggest black people to play it

I recommend it if
1- Do NOT cheat (If you cheat it makes the game less fun for yourself and others.
2- Buy the 15$ Premium pass so it makes it less likely to be put with hackers
3- Play with 2-4 friends so other online players dont troll and vote kick you as the community isn't that good
4- Enjoy and get off when stressful, its hard to win underpressure and makes it unjoyable
5- Do NOT waste all of your money on cases! They can sometimes benefit you but most likely you will waste 2.50$ and get 0.09c back!
Enjoy.
